thread.title: Perlite Canada Inc. Announces Its Results For the First Quarter of 2018

author: cnbc.com
title: Perlite Canada Inc. Announces Its Results For the First Quarter of 2018
text:
MONTREAL, March 28, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Perlite Canada inc. (the « Corporation ») (TSX VENTURE:PCI) announces hereby the results for its first quarter 2018 ended on January 31, 2018 (the “ 1 st Quarter 2018 ”).
The Corporation generated revenues of $2,300,673 during the 1 st Quarter 2018 compared to $2,183,622 during the first quarter ended January 31 st , 2017, an increase of approximately 6 %.
The Corporation recorded a profit before income taxes of $288,475 for the 1 st Quarter 2018 compared to a profit before income taxes of $293,243 for the 1 st quarter of 2017.
The Corporation generated net earnings of $184,475 for the 1 st Quarter 2018 compared to a net earnings of $293,243 for the first quarter ended on January 31 st , 2017. The difference between net earnings for the 1 st Quarter 2018 and net earnings for the 1 st quarter 2017 is explained by the income taxes amount of $104,000 payable for the 1 st Quarter 2018 while the Corporation had deferred losses in 2017 and did not have income taxes to pay.
Perlite Canada inc. has become a leading company in Canada in the processing, distribution and sale of perlite and vermiculite, two minerals used in industry and horticulture.
The common shares of Perlite Canada inc. are listed for trading on the TSX Venture Exchange.
